custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT si.* FROM AssetEntry ae INNER JOIN AssetEntries_AssetTags ae_at ON ae.entryId = ae_at.entryId INNER JOIN AssetTag ast ON ast.tagId = ae_at.tagId INNER JOIN htmsd_ShoppingItem si ON si.itemId = ae.classPK AND NOT si.quantity = 0 AND si.status = 1 AND si.name like ? OR ast.name like ? [$sort]
SELECT soi.* FROM htmsd_ShoppingOrderItem as soi INNER JOIN htmsd_ShoppingOrder as so ON soi.orderId = so.orderId AND so.orderId IN ([$ORDER_IDS$]) WHERE so.userId = ? [$LIMIT$];
